metadata.ns:textReviewContext: Someone interacts with a cloud application
metadata.ns:textName: AD04 Data Loss By Cloud Application
metadata.ns:textReviewSolution: Ensure data integrity of cloud infrastructure; Apply digital signatures; Apply data backup; Apply Data Loss Prevention (DLP);
metadata.ns:textReviewProblem: Data loss (modification) by the cloud application
metadata.ns:textReference: R.19: Compromise service engine [ENISA]; Compromise service engine [QUIRC];
